subject: Soccer
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The St. John’s men’s team extended its shutout streak to a team-record seven games last night with a 1-0 victory against visiting Monmouth in the first round of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The St. John’s men’s team extended its shutout streak to a team-record seven games last night with a 1-0 victory against visiting Monmouth in the first round of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
